description: Jessy is a community leader with resources to conduct a health check-up drive. She may allocate some or all resources to Bob, a healthcare professional. Bob can use these to set up various health camps and conduct screenings. He will then determine how much of the health data and insights to report back to Jessy.

trustor_behavior_choices.trust_none: Allocate 0 resources for the health initiative
trustor_behavior_choices.trust_low: Allocate 30% of resources for the health initiative
trustor_behavior_choices.trust_high: Allocate all resources for the health initiative

trustee_behavior_choices.return_none: Return 0 health data to the community leader
trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: Return 40-50% of health insights to the community leader
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: Return more than 80% of health insights to the community leader
